meanings.sent1: The caterpillar commutates into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The artist commutates the colors in the painting to create a new effect.
meanings.sent3: The recipe commutates the usual ingredients for a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: Time commutates our memories, turning them into stories.
meanings.sent5: The chameleon commutates its skin color to blend into its surroundings.

meanings.sent1: She commutates her lunch with her friend's sandwich.
meanings.sent2: In the game, players can commutate cards with each other.
meanings.sent3: The siblings commutate chores to help each other out.
meanings.sent4: Ideas commutate freely in a brainstorming session.
meanings.sent5: They commutate gifts during the holiday season.

meanings.definition: To commute or travel back and forth
meanings.sent1: The ferry commutates between the two islands every hour.
meanings.sent2: Workers commutate daily from the suburbs to the city.
meanings.sent3: The bee commutates between flowers to collect nectar.
meanings.sent4: The student commutates from home to school on the bus.
meanings.sent5: The train commutates passengers along the route efficiently.
